segments.template: {{ .HEAD }}{{ if .BranchStatus }} {{ .BranchStatus }}{{ end }}{{ if gt .Working.Untracked 0 }} <#2ecc71>{{ .Working.Untracked }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .Working.Modified 0 }} <#f1c40f>{{ .Working.Modified }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .Working.Deleted 0 }} <#e74c3c>{{ .Working.Deleted }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .Staging.Added 0 }} <#2ecc71>+{{ .Staging.Added }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .Staging.Modified 0 }} <#f1c40f>~{{ .Staging.Modified }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .Staging.Deleted 0 }} <#e74c3c>-{{ .Staging.Deleted }}</>{{ end }}{{ if gt .StashCount 0}} {{ .StashCount }}{{ end }}
